flawed_nl_solution:
If in eight years Brian will be 40 years old, he is currently 40-8 = <<40-8=29>>29 years old.
Since Christian is twice as old as Brian, he is 2*29 = <<2*29=58>>58 years old.
In 8 years, Christian will be 58+8 = <<58+8=66>>66 years old.
#### 66

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 29. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
